name: hockey-scorekeeper
description: Static hockey scorekeeper application for GitHub Pages deployment

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.app:build: echo 'Starting static build process...' && echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && echo 'Frontend dependencies installed' && echo 'Building frontend application...' && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build complete!' && echo 'Verifying build output...' && dir dist && echo 'Static build completed successfully!'
scripts.deploy:setup: echo 'Static deployment ready - push to main branch'

author: Chattanooga Hockey
